PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05742017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act, 2016 (Transitional Provision)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT, 2016 (TRANSITIONAL PROVISION) in order to extend the transitional period to January 23, 2018, allowing for a year from the date on which the stakeholders received clarification on the dual-method identity verification requirements and giving them adequate time to operationalize and apply the new requirements (e.g., update their internal procedures and IM/IT systems).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0115 Publication Date: 2017-06-14
AttachmentsAttachment
